name: Volcanic Lava
prompt: A VibeDeck controller made of black volcanic obsidian rock, cracked to reveal glowing orange molten lava underneath. The cracks glow like magma veins. Buttons are cooled lava rocks with orange glow beneath. The rotary knob is smooth obsidian glass. Heat shimmer effect around it. Smoke wisping from the cracks. Dangerous, primal, elemental power. The LCD glows like fire. Dark background with orange lava glow illumination.
why: Dramatic contrast, elemental power, striking visual
